name: Earbuds Wired with Microphone Pack of 5, Noise Isolating in-Ear Headphones, Powerful Heavy Bass, High Definition, Earphones Compatible with iPhone, iPod, iPad, MP3, Samsung, and Most 3.5mm Jack
short_description: About this item [Ergonomics Design]: The earphones are ergonomically designed, flexible, lightweight, allowing you to comfortably wear for long periods of time, the ear tips are soft and excellent quality, it comes with two additional different sizes of buds (M/L), you can choose the better buds to fit your ears. [Excellent Stereo Audio]: Set of 5 pieces of excellent stereo earbuds with microphone feature powerful bass and provide excellent sound input and output quality, allowing you to enjoy comfort while still having the enjoyable listening experience possible! [Built-in Microphone-Multi-Function Button]: Built-in HD microphone in earbuds and the power button function lets you can Answer/Hang Up/Play/Pause/Next/Previous Song without picking up the phone, making it easier to use. [Meticulous Design]: The 5-pack of earbuds with microphone are lightweight, tangle free cable and can easily fit in a pocket, while different colours give them more character and versatility,and the use of quality materials means a longer lifespan. [Wide Compatibility]: The earbuds are suitable for android smartphones and iPhone devices, iPad, iPod, Windows Device, Mp3 Player, compatible with most devices with 3.5mm jack
product_description: This is important for you how to keep longer use of our earbuds Please not pull the earbuds cord directly Please just hold the earphones plug part and buds part if you want to remove the headphones away from your devices or ears Please turn around the earbuds plug some cycles when connecting with your phone, this can easily solve many problems for music How to use smart button in-line control: Press one time to answer the calling, then press one time again to end the calling Press two times to refuse the calling Press one time for play/pause Press two times for the next music Press three times for the previous music Specifications: 1.Impedance: 32ohm±15% at 1KHz 2.Power Rating: 3mW 3.Maximum Input Power: 5mW 4.Distortion: 3% Maximum (1KHz/1mW) 5.Frequency: 20~20,000Hz 6.Buzze & Rattle: 50~3KHz (0.22V) 7.Cord Length: 120cm 8.Plug: 3.5mm jack 9.Weight: 11g Package Includes 5*Earphones（Color：Black Red + White Blue + Black Gold + White Red + Black Blue） 2*Silicone Ear Tips(Medium/Large) 1*Earphone Manual

name: Bluetooth Headphones 4-Mics Call Noise Cancelling 64Hrs Occiam Wireless Earbuds IPX7 Waterproof Over Ear Earphones with 2200mAh Charging Case as Power Bank for Sports Running Gaming Workout
short_description: About this item This fits your . Make sure this fits by entering your model number. P.when("ReplacementPartsBulletLoader").execute(function(module){ module.initializeDPX(); }) 【Clear Call with 4 Mics Noise Cancelling】Each earbud had a main and a vice mics,4 mics with CVC noise reduction technology work together to monitor the sounds around you and instantly produce an opposite signal to cancel background noise out,help isolate your speaking and suppress the most disruptive sound around you,make sure you can hear the caller and the caller can hear you clearly,let you confidently take meetings and calls anywhere.Perfect for business and commute. 【Multifunctional Charging Case】Each earbud can get 8 hours playtime from a single charge. 2200mAh charging case supports 8 times of recharging for both earbuds, gives up to 64 hours continuous music time. And the case is compatible with wireless charger which offers you a more convenient charging method and it also can provide emergency charging for phone.LED power display on the case can help check the power status of earbuds and charging case at any time. 【IPX7 Waterproof and Comfortable for sports】IPX7 waterproof protection level effortlessly protects the earbuds from heavy rain or sweat during intense workouts and all-weather conditions.Equipped with soft,flexible and super-secure earloops in an ultra-lightweight design and three different eartip sizes for your choice,you’ll consistently get a perfect fit that they’ll stay comfortabley firm in place.Don't worry the earbuds will fall off.Perfect for running,exercises,gym,travel. 【Mono or Stereo Mode Switch Freely】The sports wireless earbuds equiped with advanced 5.0 chips and adopted HD rendering technology,get more fast and stable signal connection and less audio transmission loss,deliver crisp and powerful sound with deep accurate bass.The bluetooth headphones not only can be used together for stereo music,but also can be used independently.At mono mode each earbud can be linked to different devices,L connected to A while R connected to B. 【Auto Pairing and Easy Operation】Just remove sports wireless earbuds from charging case,they will power on and pair with each other automatically.Then enable the bluetooth of your phone to search “K23” to connect.After the first successful connection they’ll automatically connect to the last paired device.Each bluetooth earbud has one multi-functional press button which can make /receive call,play/pause,adjust volume and switch music and etc.Easy and simple operation.
product_description: Color: Black Feature 1) Engineered for business running sports & exercise workout 2) 4 microphones CVC noise reduction technology improve the clarity of your voice while reducing background sounds. 3) Adopt the most advanced wireless technology that offers rich sound with defined equalization,bring you powerful bass and detailed music experience. 4) The wireless earbuds will give u up to 8 hours of playtime on one charge with an additional 64 hours from the charging case – keep the music going all week. 5) Large capacity of 2200mAh can provide emergency charging for your mobile. 6) Charge the charging case with type-c charging cable or wireless charging pad(not included). 7) IPX7 Waterproof defends your wireless bluetooth earphones against liquids, rains, sweats.(Note: the charging case is not waterproof.) 8) One-step pairing,automatically connect with the last paired device. 9) Ergonomically designed with an oblique angle and the silicon ear-tips shape to your ear canal to go deeper and seal better. Isolate noise as well as enhance comfort. 10) Each bluetooth earbud can be used independently on 2 different devices at mono mode,for example: R earbud for mobile A, L earbud for mobile B.Or both wireless earbuds can be used together on one device for stereo music. Spec 1.Bluetooth Version:BT5.0+EDR 2.Supports:HSP/HFP/A2DP/AVRCP 3.Charging Port:Type-C 4.Battery Capacity:(Li-ion battery inside) Earbud:75mAh Charging case: 2200mAh 5.Battery Life: win Earbuds will last 8 hours on single fully charge(Actual battery life changes with the song types and volume requirements) 6.Standby Time:Up to 100 hours 7.Charging Time:1-1.5Hrs for earbuds /2.5Hrs for charging case 8.Transmission Range:33feet (with no obstacle) 9.Earbud Weight/Size:10g/37*55*30mm
